flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=150>>150 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 150 + 35 = <<150+35=185>>185 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 185 - 15 = 170 books

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 150. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
